meta.title: Outdoor Wedding and Event Space | 620 Loft & Garden at Rockefeller Center
meta.description: 620 Loft & Garden at Rockefeller Center is one of NYC's most sought-after outdoor event spaces. Enjoy an exquisite rooftop setting framed by Manhattan landmarks.

meta.title: Private Event Rooftop Venue with Incredible NYC Views | Bar SixtyFive
meta.description: Reserve this unique private party space, and enjoy Manhattan's most elevated lounge experience with breathtaking NYC views at the historic Bar SixtyFive.

meta.title: Private Dining Room at Rainbow Room | NYC Private Event Space
meta.description: Hold your special event 65 stories above NYC in the exclusive Private Dining Room. Impress your guests with personalized attention, walls of windows, and striking views.

meta.title: Glamorous Private Dining Room for Unique Events | Rainbow Room
meta.description: Plan your special event at the magical Rainbow Room, Rock Center's private dining room unlike any other. Celebrate at a legendary event venue with incredible NYC views.

meta.title: The Gallery at Rockefeller Center | Midtown Party Venue
meta.description: Adjacent to the Rainbow Room, The Gallery is an intimate Rockefeller Center party venue. With views of the Empire State Building, every moment here is larger than life.
